DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy topical MOB015B patient mild moderate distal subungual onychomycosis ( DSO ) . The secondary objective evaluate safety topical MOB015B patient mild moderate DSO .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Topical MOB015B Treatment Mild Moderate Distal Subungual Onychomycosis ( DSO )
